name: 5 Minute Theatre
description: This is my first game for a jam.  Move with WASD and shoot arrow keys. Dev note, it is probably impossible to beat the game on the first run, if you do let me know, then I have to make it harder.  I was way too ambitious, had a bunch more ideas. Even made my own music, much harder than I thought it was.  Thanks for the support of my two siblings for lending me their voices. Thanks Maddox and Molly.
